name: Little Seaside
description:
A low poly interactive seaside environment. Pick up the boats and find highlight points!

Controls:

Interact - Left Click

Return to Main View - Right Click

This is an interactive version of my seaside model, which can be found here: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/little-seaside-scene-0583f056408c41adac61e33f84671d68

Sound credits:

Bubble1 by Godowan (https://freesound.org/people/Godowan/sounds/235264/)

Boat Motor by Pawsound (https://freesound.org/people/pawsound/sounds/154833/)

Boat Horn by Devy32 (https://freesound.org/people/devy32/sounds/441223/)

Seagulls by Ichadney (https://freesound.org/people/inchadney/sounds/78389/)

Splash, Small by InspectorJ (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/416710/)
